name: Click Element
description: Simulate clicking a button, link, or interactive element in a rendered component. Use this to trigger actions like submitting forms, opening dialogs, or navigating. The tool will find the element by CSS selector, data attribute, or button text.

componentId.description: The ID of the component containing the element (e.g., 'form-1', 'table-results'). This is the module ID assigned when the component was rendered.

elementSelector.description: CSS selector, data attribute, or button text to find the element. Examples: 'button[data-action=submit]', '#save-btn', 'Submit', '[aria-label="Close"]'. If no element matches the selector, the tool will try to match by text content.

waitForResponse.description: Wait for component to respond before returning (default: true). Set to false for immediate return.
